definition: to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 在這世界上躊躇不決成績不了任何事。

sentences.english: Don't falter in your resolve, or you will miss the chance in a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 別再躊躇不決了，否則你會錯過這次良機。

sentences.english: She wavered between going and staying .
sentences.chinese: 她對於去和留躊躇不決。

sentences.english: The banks balked, so Bair went public.
sentences.chinese: 銀行卻躊躇不決，於是，拜爾決定將此事公開。

sentences.english: I'm stumbling at this step and can't make a move.
sentences.chinese: 我對這一步驟躊躇不決，沒能往前邁。
